paper_abstract: In this paper, we study an approximation scheme that combines a stabilized nonconforming finite element method and a two-level method to solve the stationary Navier-Stokes equations. Error estimates of optimal order are obtained. Numerical results to check these estimates are presented. (C) 2012 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A two-level stabilized nonconforming finite element method for the stationary Navier-Stokes equations
